data.title: EDB Home - EDB Postgres® AI
data.text:
Introducing EDB Postgres®AI

An intelligent platform for unified management of transactional, analytical, and AI workloads — powered by Postgres.

EDB Postgres AI solves common enterprise challenges by extending enterprise-grade Postgres with native AI vector processing, an analytics lakehouse, and a unified platform for observability and hybrid data management.

EDB Builds Best-in-Class Network of Strategic Alliances to Further Advance Postgres for the AI Generation

On May 23, EDB announced strategic alliances with top industry players, including Carahsoft, Ericsson, Nutanix, Red Hat, SADA, and Supermicro. These relationships will enhance data and cloud agility across various environments and clouds, offering joint customers an unparalleled competitive advantage in building AI-driven applications.

Unleashing AI with PostgreSQL

In this 8-part video series, EDB VP and Chief Architect for Analytics & AI Torsten Steinbach covers the AI landscape, dives deep into data infrastructure as it relates to AI, and describes the essential elements of an AI data platform such as EDB Postgres AI.

Gain insights into our security posture with the new EDB Trust Center

The EDB Trust Center is a comprehensive knowledge base focused on security, privacy, and compliance. Visit the Trust Center to request access to security documentation.
